[Minify](http://coderaiser.github.io/minify "Minify") - a minifier of js, css, html and img files.

## Install

```
npm i minify --save
```

## How to use?

```js
minify('client.js', function(error, data) {
    if (error)
        console.error(error.message);
    else
        console.log(data);
});
```
